column4: hi all. just browsed through /var/log/message and found this: Aug 24 08:02:06 localhost -- MARK -- What does it mean?
that your system is not dead

It puts notes there if there' s nothing to report, basically, just to tell you that it was still alive & kicking (to at least some degree), so that in case of a system crash, you roughly know when it happpened
